data.title: Gina Torres Is Joining Shondaland Series 'The Catch'
data.meta_description: Details haven't leaked, but Torres' role is recurring.
data.text:
After five and a half seasons, Gina Torres said goodbye to Suits during the show’s summer finale, but Variety recently learned that Torres will be gracing our screens once again in Shonda Rhimes’ latest series The Catch.

Reports state that Torres will join the show’s second season as a recurring character. The actress has also appeared in other ABC hits including Revenge and Castle.

It seems ABC has kept an eye on Torres, waiting for the perfect role and opportunity to have the actress join the network.

WANT MORE FROM ESSENCE? Subscribe to our daily newsletter for the latest in hair, beauty, style and celebrity news.

Grey’s Anatomy alum T.R. Knight will make a guest appearance on the show as well.

The Catch follows a Los Angeles private investigator, who busts scammers and helps victims of fraud while searching for the fiancé who conned her.

No further details about Torres’ role have been leaked, but we’re sure that whatever Torres’ character gets up to will have viewers on the edge of their seat.
